Articles.Content:
Basically, this is just a thread about video games. But let's break it down, shall we?

So, I am going to start by saying a game's name (that is not ksp) and either you guys can talk about it or "switch it up" by saying a different video game title's name. That is going to be my Kickstarter for an endless loop of those two options. And last but not least before I give the name of the game, an example:

Me: [This stuff]

Poster1: I think the the best feature in xxx is xxx.

Poster2: BORRING! New Game: xxx

And here it is, the first game is: Shovel Knight!

I've heard of that game before, and I think it's gotten some good reviews (I think). I've never played it before, though.

New game: Space Engine.

Very nice visuals, but the controls are a chore to learn.

New game: Space Station 13
